title: Ticket #2303: shared port fails to touch named socket
description:
I see the following in the shadow log: 

    SharedPortEndpoint: failed to touch /data/glidecondor/condor_local/log/daemon_sock/19461_c8f0_425927: Permission denied

The file is owned by condor. The shadow probably needs to switch to condor perms before touching the file.
check_ins: 2011-Jul-14 10:00   Check-in [22499]: Fixed permission problem when touching shared port named socket. ===GT:Fixed=== #2303 ===VersionHistory=== When using a shared port and when condor was running as root, condor_shadow failed to periodically update the timestamp on its named socket. This could cause the socket to be removed by condor_preen [...] (By Dan Bradley )
